root.name: Wrath of the Black Manta
root.description: Wrath of the Black Manta follows a Ninja Warrior through a series of 5 Levels, as he attempts to track down "El Toro", and his gang who are behind a series of child kidnappings. Throughout each level you may come across various clues to help you find where to go next or lead you to a hidden location.The Black Mantas arsenal of skills and weapons include: Shurikens (Throwing stars), "ninja arts" (which he obtains after completing a level), which allow Manta special powers, and abilities (such as Shadow, and Ground Fire to name a few). After each level you gain abilities, which you can then change / select from the menu screen.
